      • removeRedundantArcs

        protected static void removeRedundantArcs(int row,
                                          int column,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> MARCS,
                                          McgregorHelper mcGregorHelper)
        The function is called in function partsearch. The function is given a temporary matrix and a position (row/column) within this matrix. First the function sets all entries to zero, which can be excluded in respect to the current atom by atom matching. After this the function replaces all entries in the same row and column of the current position by zeros. Only the entry of the current position is set to one. Return value "count_arcsleft" counts the number of arcs, which are still in the matrix.
        Parameters:
        row -
        column -
        MARCS -
        mcGregorHelper -
